created_at.description: The creation time of the VPC endpoint service, in RFC3339 format.

enable_policy.description: Whether the VPC endpoint policy can be customized.

endpoint_service_id.description: Specifies the ID of the VPC endpoint service.

endpoint_service_name.description: Specifies the name of the VPC endpoint service.

is_charge.description: Whether the VPC endpoint connected to the VPC endpoint service is charged.

public_border_group.description: The public border group information about the pool corresponding to the VPC endpoint.

region.description: Specifies the region in which to query the resource. If omitted, the provider-level region will be used.

service_name.description: The name of the VPC endpoint service.

service_type.description: The type of the VPC endpoint service.
